name: Spiders Web
overview: Micky is a greedy little Spider. Most Spiders are creepy and crawly but not our Micky, his is a loveable little fellow and right now he’s hungry. So, if you could, would you please help Micky to trap some food, ie: Wasps, Flies, etc. on his web and take them to his lair. Now most Spiders don’t have much difficulty catching Flies but Micky is such a ice Spider, the Flies gang up on him. Some of the Flies and Wasps land on Mickys web and then break away so as to try and destroy his web. If Micky is on the thread that the Flies take with them, then its Bye-Bye Micky! So you can see Micky needs all the help he can get. The Flies and Wasps drop faster and faster and so make life very difficult tor our poor hairy friend. If not IMPOSSIBLE.
